Chick-Fil-A : Buy a $20 Gift Card, Get a Free Calendar
Calendar normally costs $5.
It is loaded with coupons valued at over $30

ooooh... green for OP
I always get a couple calendars and since I am eating at Chick-fil-a I might as well buy the gift cards and get the calendars for free. Woo-hoo!
